name: @cumulus/generate-granules
description: Generates fake granules for testing workflows, the files don't exist.

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --sourcemap=inline --target=node16.19 --outdir=dist
scripts.package: npm run build && (cd dist && zip -r lambda.zip index.js schemas)
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress -w

author: Cumulus Authors
